document_data.name: Nacacia
document_data.mainbody: '''Nacacia''' was a female [[half-elf]] slave in [[Myth Drannor]], in service to [[Llombaerth Starym|the Masked]], and a caster during the laying of the ''[[mythal]]''.
document_data.Personality: She'd been bubbly and pranksome when she started her apprenticeship. However, by the end of it, she was no longer a prankster. She remained merry and bright, though.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|317|324}}
document_data.Description: As of {{yearlink|324}}, she had long auburn hair and a surprisingly strong back. She most often wore black breeches and a vest.
document_data.Abilities: She could cast one lashing lightning spell that struck many, almost certainly ''[[lightning bolt]]'', and ''[[magic missile]]''. One of her spells, which she often used for her master's pleasure, animated her hair; she also worked spells in [[spell-web]]s craeted by her master.
document_data.Relationships: Her master, [[Llombaerth Starym]], always known as the Masked, often called on her to animate her hair for his entertainment in evenings at his chambers. Though she flirted with [[Elminster Aumar]], the master's other apprentice, her master actively crushed any flirting and punished them severely for it. She became the latter's paramour at some point between {{yearlink|261}} and {{yearlink|650}}.
